course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Energy System Modelling for Buildings and Cities
course.description: This course provides theory and hands-on experience about energy system modelling for buildings and cities. Lectures cover physical concepts, mathematical laws, and software tools for city and building energy system modelling. This course starts with heat transfer basics and building thermal dynamics. Then it teaches energy system modelling using Modelica, an emerging equation-based programming language. Both the building-scale energy system (HVAC) and the city-scale energy system (district heating and cooling system) are covered. Through hands-on tutorials, students learn Modelica (with IDE of Dymola) and use it to simulate energy systems for buildings and cities. Instructor’s approval is required.
course.prerequisites: (MATH 1014 OR MATH 1024) AND (PHYS 1112 OR PHYS 1312)

reviews.author: HowieLaw
reviews.title: 好人prof
reviews.comment_content:
主要講下heating同cooling點運作,然後教你點樣build 一個model去模擬返個情景.

Model都算易,基本上就算唔識programming都冇問題.

如果識thermal dynamics的話會易讀好多,唔識都唔緊要,一開始professor會花時間講下.

1. Introduction
2. Review I - Thermal dynamics
3. Review II - Heat transfer I
4. Review III - Heat transfer II
5. Room level thermal dynamics
6. Dynamic system modeling I
7. Dynamic system modeling II
8. Modelica I - introduction
9. Lab1. Solving ODE and PDE
10. HVAC overview
11. HVAC heat source
12. HVAC heat pump I
13. Lab2. Simple envelope model
14. Modelica II - OOP
15. Lab3. Using MixedAir model
16. HVAC heat pump II
17. Lab4. Building energy modeling
18. HVAC distribution system
19. Pump and fan
20. HVAC terminal
21. Human building interaction
22. HVAC control
23. District heating and cooling system I
24. District heating and cooling system II
reviews.comment_teaching:
professor都算有心,講野都算清楚
不過有時會好快咁帶過咗重點,要自己追返.同埋有時有d野會講漏,搞到功課唔識.

基本上揾professor佢都會好快答.
reviews.comment_workload:
基本上無workload,得3份asm,不過有d上堂未必有講,但係靠phy底可以解決.(功課可以遲交幾日)

本身有個project不過因為肺炎變咗做一份asm (Total 3+1份)

Final exam就同asm差唔多,識做asm就唔會出事.
